title: FS: Rare 1890 Old Judge & N172 Bobby Mathews
author: z28jd

posts.post_title: FS: Rare 1890 Old Judge & N172 Bobby Mathews
posts.post_content:
For sale is a rare 1890 Old Judge card. Not only is it tough to find cards from the last year of production, they are usually low grade when you can find them. SGC 55 Harry Decker NL card. ON HOLD

  Also have a Bobby Mathews. High on a lot of wantlists because he has 297 career wins and will likely make the Hall of Fame someday(you would assume). Nice looking SGC 40. SOLD

  I included bigger scans of each card to show more detail, but the true color of the cards are the ones where you can see the full holder
I can attest to John's contention about the rarity and usual condition of 1890 Old Judge cards, which quite often have faded and murky images. That Decker's a beauty.
